info.name: Stylish Admin - Night Owl
info.description: A dark theme for the Stylish edit page, manage page, and pop-up that allows the user to customize a link and accent color for a slightly more personalized theme. Enjoy! Please leave me feedback here. It helps me know what you want and what needs to be fixed so I can make my theme better, so please give descriptive feedback. If you like my theme, I would appreciate it if you would comment on and rate it.
info.additionalInfo:
Changelog

[1.0.1]
-Added color for "No styles installed for this site"

[1.0.0]
-Initial Release.

data.title: Best style for the stylish app imho.
